txt.en:
'Have you heard about Trestlebridge to the north? Its location makes it a tempting target for Orc raiders and brigands. I'm sure your help in its defence would be most appreciated.

'Gather your belongings and travel north to Trestlebridge. The Greenway is the most expeditious path, and the most well-trod. Keep to it and you should be safe.

'When you arrive, seek out Guardsman Otley. He'll point you in the right direction.'
'Bree-town sent you, eh? It's good to know that our messengers arrived safe and sound. And now that you're here, well it's good to have another sword-arm for the cause.'
The town of Trestlebridge is threatened by the Enemy and needs help from afar.
Trestlebridge is to the north, along the route called the Greenway. \n\nSpeak to Guardsman Otley in Trestlebridge and learn how you can help with the town's defence.
